name: Pop Painter
summary:
Pop Painter unleashes your artistic flair as you create a painting canvas full of colour. Your task is to build up the colour bubbles as much as you can before popping them to create a unique painting with every game. Shoot bubbles with the artist to make the bubbles on the canvas bounce against each other to inflate them. Some bumpers allow you to grow them bigger and some bumpers are sharp and pop them bubbles before they grow. Every bubble that pops splashes paint on your canvas to create your own masterpiece.

Any bubble can grow 4 times before it pops automatically when bouncing. The bigger they are when they burst the more colour is splashed and the value of the painting increases. Plan your shot to bounce as many bubbles as possible with each shot to create a painting that will sell at an amazing price at the final auction.
